MacMarriageCandidate.Description: Makes Mac a marriage candidate, limiting his storyline.

YosefMarriageCandidate.Description: Makes Yosef a marriage candidate, changing his storyline.

RolfMarriageCandidate.Description: Makes Rolf a marriage candidate, changing his storyline.

NewFarmCleared.Description: Determines whether trees, weeds, and such are spawned on the new farm near Stoffton.

NewFarmPrice.Description: Price of the new farm for sale in Stoffton.
